eternlFee.label: Dapp Tarayıcı Ücreti
eternlFee.hover: Eternl hizmetlerinin sürdürülmesine yardımcı olan bir ücret.

swapFee.label: Hizmet Ücreti
swapFee.hover: Eternl hizmetlerinin sürdürülmesine yardımcı olan bir ücret.

mint.label: Mint
mint.hover: İşlem mint edilmiş veya burn edilmiş token(lar) içeriyor

pendingapproval.label: Pending approval
pendingapproval.hover: Transaction is awaiting additional signatures by wallet(s) in your control

awaitingothers.label: Awaiting others
awaitingothers.hover: Transaction is awaiting additional signatures by external participants

invalid.label: Invalid
invalid.hover: An input of this transaction was spent in a different transaction.

staging.label: Unsigned
staging.hover: This transaction was not signed yet.

signed.label: Signed
signed.hover: This transaction is signed but not submitted yet.

inputSigned.label: Signed
inputSigned.hover: The signature for this input has been provided.

inputSignedSC.label: SC
inputSignedSC.hover: The redeemer for this contract has been provided.

inputUnsigned.label: Unsigned
inputUnsigned.hover: The signature for this input is missing.

validFor.label: Valid for
validFor.hover: Transaction will be executed eventually or become invalid if an input utxo was consumed by a different transaction.

unlockTimeStamp.label: Unlock at
unlockTimeStamp.hover: These Staking Vault funds will unlock at that date.

stakingvault.label: Staking Vault
stakingvault.hover: This transaction locks funds in Staking Vault.

unlimited.label: No time limit
unlimited.hover: Transaction will be executed eventually or become invalid if an input utxo was consumed by a different transaction.

remove.label: Remove
remove.hover: Click to remove an expired or invalid transaction.
remove.hoverNote: Only remove, if you know that this transaction won't go through anymore.

add_entity.label: +entity
add_entity.hover: Set an entity name for this address.

submit.label: işlemi gönder
submit.hover: İşlem henüz gönderilmedi. Göndermek için buraya tıklayın.

adaHandle.label: Ada Handle
adaHandle.hover: Çözümlenmiş, $ ile başlayan Ada Handle adresi

unstoppableDomains.label: Unstoppable Domains
unstoppableDomains.hover: Çözümlenmiş, .clay ile biten Unstoppable Domains adresi

updated.label: Güncellendi
updated.hover: Bildirim içeriği son okumadan beri güncellendi
